description: This file defines a React component named 'Quiz' which renders a multiple-choice quiz interface. It manages user answers, calculates the score on submission, and displays quiz questions with options.

methods.name: Quiz({ quiz, onSubmit })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a quiz with multiple-choice questions, handles user responses, and calculates the score on submission.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Updates the user's answer for a specific question.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles the form submission, calculates the total score, percentage, and invokes the onSubmit callback.
